documentation.text:
@dev Fenwicks update. If `isAdd == true`, we add `delta`. If false, we subtract `delta`.
      Complexity: O(log N).
@dev Fenwicks prefix sum query: sum from 1..i
@dev Single-user point query: how many tickets does user #i own?

@dev Given r in [1..totalTickets], find the smallest i s.t fenwicksQuery(i) >= r.
      Complexity: O(log N).

@title BaseRaffle
 @notice A sample raffle contract using a Fenwicks (Binary Indexed Tree) in purely uint256 form to avoid large loops.
